instructions: In a large saucepan over medium heat, cook ground beef with onion until brown; drain.
Stir tomatoes, tomato paste, basil, garlic powder, oregano and mushrooms into beef mixture.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer one hour.
title: Spaghetti Sauce III
steps: In a large saucepan over medium heat, cook ground beef with onion until brown; drain. Stir tomatoes, tomato paste, basil, garlic powder, oregano and mushrooms into beef mixture. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer one hour. Serve over hot pasta.
